TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit StronglyTypedResourceBuilder extends System.Object
public ref class StronglyTypedResourceBuilder abstract sealed

summary.span: 为强类型资源提供支持。

span.span: Provides support for strongly typed resources.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，资源会在应用程序中将代码与内容分离。Typically, resources separate code from content within an application. 通过创建和使用这些资源，可以更轻松地开发可本地化的应用程序。Creating and consuming these resources makes it easier to develop localizable applications. 在 .NET Framework 中，通常使用 类来使用资源，该类包含在运行时提供对特定于区域性的资源的访问的方法。In the .NET Framework, resources are usually consumed by using the class, which contains methods that provide access to culture-specific resources at run time. 有关创建和使用资源的详细信息，请参阅[桌面应用中的资源](/dotnet/framework/resources/)。For more information about creating and consuming resources, see [Resources in Desktop Apps](/dotnet/framework/resources/). 强类型资源支持是一项编译时功能，它通过创建包含一组静态只读（`get`）属性的类来封装对资源的访问。Strongly typed resource support is a compile-time feature that encapsulates access to resources by creating classes that contain a set of static, read-only (`get`) properties. 这提供了一种使用资源而不是调用 和 方法的替代方法。This provides an alternative way to consume resources instead of calling the and methods. 强类型资源支持的基本功能由 类（以及[resgen.exe （资源文件生成器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator)中的 `/str` 命令行选项提供。The basic functionality for strongly typed resource support is provided by the class (as well as the `/str` command-line option in the [Resgen.exe (Resource File Generator)](/dotnet/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator)). 方法的输出是一个包含强类型属性的类，这些属性与输入参数中引用的资源相匹配。The output of the method is a class that contains strongly typed properties that match the resources that are referenced in the input parameter. 此类提供对处理的文件中可用的资源的只读访问。This class provides read-only access to the resources that are available in the file processed. ## Examples 下面的示例生成一个名为 `DemoResources` 的类，它是用 C# 或 Visual Basic 编写的（具体取决于示例的源代码）。The following example generates a class named `DemoResources` that is written in C# or Visual Basic (depending on the example's source code). 此类位于 `DemoApp` 命名空间中，并且具有返回徽标位图和应用程序名称的属性。This class is in the `DemoApp` namespace and has properties that return the bitmap of a logo and the name of an application. 该示例调用 `CreateResourceFile` 方法来创建必要的 .resw 文件，并要求在示例的当前目录中找到一个名为徽标键的位图文件。The example calls a `CreateResourceFile` method to create the necessary .resw file and requires that a bitmap file named Logo.bmp be found in the example's current directory. 此代码示例使用以下名为 demo 的资源文件：The code example uses the following resource file, named demo.resx: [!code-csharp[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 然后，你的应用程序代码可以使用类，如下所示：Your application code can then use the class as follows: [!code-csharp[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/cs/demoresources.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/vb/demoresources.vb#2)]

summary.span: 生成一个类文件，该文件包含与输入参数中所指定的资源相匹配的强类型属性。

span.span: Generates a class file that contains strongly typed properties that match the resources that are specified in the input parameter.

param.name: resourceList
param.span: 一个 集合，其中每个字典条目键值对都是资源的名称以及资源的值。

span.span: An collection where each dictionary entry key/value pair is the name of a resource and the value of the resource.

param.name: baseName
param.span: 要生成的类的名称。

span.span: The name of the class to be generated.

param.name: generatedCodeNamespace
param.span: 要生成的类的命名空间。

span.span: The namespace of the class to be generated.

param.name: codeProvider
param.span: 一个 类，该类提供生成该类所使用的语言。

span.span: A class that provides the language in which the class will be generated.

param.name: internalClass
param.span: 如果生成内部类，则为 ；如果生成公共类，则为 。

span.span: to generate an internal class; to generate a public class.

param.name: unmatchable
param.span: 一个数组，该数组包含无法为其生成属性的每个资源名称。

span.span: An array that contains each resource name for which a property cannot be generated.

param.span: 通常，无法生成属性是因为该资源名称不是有效的标识符。

span.span: Typically, a property cannot be generated because the resource name is not a valid identifier.

summary.span: 生成一个类文件，该文件包含与指定集合中引用的资源相匹配的强类型的属性。

span.span: Generates a class file that contains strongly typed properties that match the resources referenced in the specified collection.
A container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法生成一个类，该类提供强类型化的只读包装器来访问包含在 `resourceList` 参数中的资源。Use the method to generate a class that provides a strongly typed, read-only wrapper to access the resources that are contained in the `resourceList` parameter. 类将忽略以字符 "$" 或 "> >" 开头的任何资源名称。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 资源名称 "Culture" 和 "ResourceManager" 是无效的标识符。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

span.span: , , or is .

exception.span: 资源节点名称与其在 中的键不匹配。

span.span: A resource node name does not match its key in .

summary.span: 生成一个类文件，该文件包含与指定的 .resx 文件中的资源相匹配的强类型属性。

A container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法生成一个类，该类提供对包含在 `resxFile` 参数中的资源的强类型只读访问。Use the method to generate a class that provides strongly typed, read-only access to the resources that are contained in the `resxFile` parameter. 类将忽略以字符 "$" 或 "> >" 开头的任何资源名称。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 资源名称 "Culture" 和 "ResourceManager" 是无效的标识符。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

A container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载使你能够使用 `resourcesNamespace` 参数为生成的资源指定命名空间。This overload enables you to use the `resourcesNamespace` parameter to specify the namespace for the generated resources. 在这种情况下，生成的代码如下所示：In this case, the generated code appears as follows: ``` System.Resources.ResourceManager rm = new System.Resources.ResourceManager(".",typeof(baseName).Assembly); ``` 在大多数情况下，不需要从应用程序代码调用此方法。In most cases, you do not need to call this method from your application code. 类将忽略以字符 "$" 或 "> >" 开头的任何资源名称。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 资源名称 "Culture" 和 "ResourceManager" 是无效的标识符。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

span.span: , , or is .

exception.span: 资源节点名称与其在 中的键不匹配。

span.span: A resource node name does not match its key in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法生成一个类，该类提供对包含在 `resxFile` 参数中的资源的强类型只读访问。Use the method to generate a class that provides strongly typed, read-only access to the resources that are contained in the `resxFile` parameter. 类将忽略以字符 "$" 或 "> >" 开头的任何资源名称。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 资源名称 "Culture" 和 "ResourceManager" 是无效的标识符。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string VerifyResourceName (string key, System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider provider);
.method public static hidebysig string VerifyResourceName(string key, class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider provider) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyResourceName (key As String, provider As CodeDomProvider) As String
public: static System::String ^ VerifyResourceName(System::String ^ key, System::CodeDom::Compiler::CodeDomProvider ^ provider);
static member VerifyResourceName : string * System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider -> string

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: key
param.span: 待验证的字符串，如有必要，则转换为有效的资源名称。

span.span: The string to verify and, if necessary, convert to a valid resource name.

param.name: provider
param.span: 对象，它指定将使用的目标语言。

span.span: A object that specifies the target language to use.

summary.span: 根据指定的输入字符串和代码提供程序，生成一个有效的资源字符串。

span.span: Generates a valid resource string based on the specified input string and code provider.

returns.span: 派生自 参数的有效资源名称。

span.span: A valid resource name derived from the parameter.

returns.span: 如果根据 参数所指定的语言，派生的字符串仍包含无效字符，所有无效标记都会被下划线 (_) 字符或 替代。

span.span: Any invalid tokens are replaced with the underscore (_) character, or if the derived string still contains invalid characters according to the language specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `key` 参数是有效的字符串，则返回该字符串。If the `key` parameter is a valid string of characters, that string is returned. 如果 `key` 参数是无效字符串或包含无效字符的字符串，则 方法会尝试根据 `key` 和 `provider` 参数生成有效的字符串。If the `key` parameter is an invalid string or a string that contains invalid characters, the method attempts to generate a valid string based on the `key` and `provider` parameters. 如果可以生成有效的字符串，则返回该字符串;否则，将返回 `null`。If a valid string can be generated, that string is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned. 如果 `key` 参数为空字符串（""），则返回一个包含单个下划线字符（_）的字符串。If the `key` parameter is an empty string (""), a string that consists of a single underscore character (_) is returned. 如果 `key` 参数不是空字符串，则 方法会根据 `provider` 参数所指定的语言，将字符串中的每个字符与一组无效的标记进行比较。If the `key` parameter is not an empty string, the method compares each character in the string to a set of invalid tokens based on the language specified by the `provider` parameter. 将字符串中的任何无效字符替换为下划线字符。Any invalid character in the string is replaced with an underscore character. 将替换为下划线的字符如下所示：The characters that will be replaced with an underscore are as follows: "" （空格）、U + 00A0 （非间断空格）、"."（period），"，" （逗号），";"（分号）、" | "、"~"、"@"、"#"、"%"、"^"、"&"、"\*"、"+"、"-"、"/"、"\\"、"\<"、">"、"？"、"["、"]"、"（"、"）"、"{"、"}"、"" "（引号）、" ' "（撇号）、"： "和"！ "。' ' (space), U+00A0 (non-breaking space), '.' (period), ',' (comma), ';' (semicolon), '|', '~', '@', '#', '%', '^', '&', '\*', '+', '-', '/', '\\', '\<', '>', '?', '[', ']', '(', ')', '{', '}', '"' (quote), ''' (apostrophe), ':', and '!'. > [!NOTE] > 强类型资源不允许使用语言关键字（例如 `if`、`for`等）作为资源键名称。Strongly typed resources do not allow the use of language keywords (such as `if`, `for`, and so on) as resource key names. 但 设计模式允许使用语言关键字，方法是使用下划线作为关键字的前缀。However, the design pattern allows the use of language keywords by prefixing the keyword with the underscore character. 方法调用 方法来强制实施此设计。The method calls the method to enforce this design. 例如，如果使用与 language 关键字（如 `for`）相同的资源名称，则该名称将在生成的强类型资源类中显示为 `_for`。For example, if you use a resource name that is the same as a language keyword, such as `for`, the name appears as `_for` in the generated strongly typed resource class.

span.span: or is .
